OtherComments.Content: Unmapped Subscripts for Fractions This script inserts unmapped subscripted numerals as denominators and subscripted letters a-z for use with fractions. The vertical postion on the baseline is defined in CompositeData.xml and will need adjusting for different sized glyphs

GlyphInsertGlyphs.GlyphNames: zero.dnom-nine.dnom plus.subs minus.subs equal.subs multiply.subs divide.subs parenleft.subs parenright.subs A.subs-Z.subs a.subs-z.subs
